text: He adama-santanagana! Sayatana yena tomadera kichute'i pralobhita na kare, yemana se tomadera pitamatake bera kare diyechila e'i bagana theke, tadera theke tadera posaka chinna kaâ€™re, yena se tadera dekhate pare tadera lajja. Nihsandeha se tomadera dekhe -- se o tara kaphela, yekhana theke tomara tadera dekhate pa'o na. Nihsandeha amara sayatanake baniyechi tadera abhibhabaka yara bisbasa kare na.
